lamé.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: cloth containing gold or silver threads
lamé.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: unable to walk properly because your leg or foot is injured or weak
lamé.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: a lame excuse or explanation is weak and difficult to believe
lamé.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: a lame attempt to deflect criticism
She gave some lame excuse about missing the bus.
lamé.translation[1].definitions[3].examp: A lot of the songs on this album are a bit lame.
lamé.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to make a person or animal unable to walk properly
lamé.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: He was lamed in the accident.
